module.title: Story Point Estimation Mastery
module.description: Master the art of relative sizing in agile development

exercises.title: Abstract Comparisons
exercises.description: Learn relative sizing with abstract items
exercises.details: Start with simple abstract concepts to understand relative effort without real-world bias.

startScreen.instructions: You'll be presented with abstract items like "a grain of sand," "a pebble," "a boulder," and "a mountain." Your task is to arrange them by relative effort to move, then assign story points.

ui.mindsetReminder: Remember: Story points are about relative effort, not absolute time. A '3' is roughly three times the effort of a '1'.

exercises.title: Foundation Stories
exercises.description: Apply sizing to clear, simple user stories
exercises.details: Practice with straightforward user stories that have clear requirements and low complexity.

startScreen.instructions: Work with clear, simple user stories to build your foundation in story point estimation. Focus on relative sizing and consistent point assignment.

exercises.title: Intermediate Stories
exercises.details: Practice with stories that have some complexity factors and team estimation variance.

startScreen.instructions: Work with moderately complex user stories that include some uncertainty and team variance. Practice handling estimation challenges.

exercises.title: Story Breakdown Workshop
exercises.description: Learn when and how to break down large stories
exercises.details: Practice identifying stories that need breakdown and applying decomposition techniques.

startScreen.instructions: Learn to identify when stories are too large and practice breaking them down into smaller, estimable pieces.

exercises.title: Team Estimation Dynamics
exercises.details: Explore how different team contexts and perspectives affect story point estimation.

startScreen.instructions: Explore how team composition, experience, and context affect estimation. Practice collaborative estimation techniques.

exercises.title: Expert Scenarios
exercises.description: Handle high-uncertainty and complex estimation challenges
exercises.details: Work with the most challenging estimation scenarios involving multiple complexity factors.

startScreen.instructions: Master the most challenging estimation scenarios with high uncertainty, multiple complexity factors, and significant risk considerations.

exercises.title: Knowledge Assessment
exercises.description: Validate your story point estimation mastery
exercises.details: Comprehensive assessment covering all aspects of story point estimation.

startScreen.instructions: Complete a comprehensive assessment of your story point estimation skills across all complexity levels and scenarios.
